hf.name: Dr. Frankel
hf.appearance: Tall, thin, with wild gray hair

json_to_edit.voice_over: I never imagined I'd meet the man who created my perfect copy.
json_to_edit.description: Alex confronts Dr. Frankel about the Doppelgänger that has taken over his life.
json_to_edit.name: Confrontation with Creator
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Alex meets Dr. Frankel to confront him about the Doppelgänger that has stolen his identity.

qa.action: A sleek, futuristic laboratory filled with strange equipment and glowing screens.

hf.action: Alex bursts into the lab, looking frantic and disheveled.

tr.action: Alex's wide, panicked eyes as he scans the room.

xc.action: Dr. Frankel emerges from behind a large machine, looking calm but wary.

ka.action: Alex confronts Dr. Frankel, gesticulating wildly as he speaks.

fn.action: Dr. Frankel's face, a mix of pride and concern as he listens to Alex.

af.action: Alex slams his fist on a nearby table, causing equipment to rattle.

qo.action: Alex and Dr. Frankel face off, tension palpable between them.

fp.action: Dr. Frankel's eyes, revealing a glimmer of regret and fear.

edit_command: Remove every third shot from the scene, but don't change anything else.

updated_json.voice_over: I never imagined I'd meet the man who created my perfect copy.
updated_json.description: Alex confronts Dr. Frankel about the Doppelgänger that has taken over his life.
updated_json.name: Confrontation with Creator
updated_json.scene_summary: Alex meets Dr. Frankel to confront him about the Doppelgänger that has stolen his identity.

label.rationale: we will remove every third shot from the scene as requested, while keeping all other elements unchanged. this means we'll remove shots with keys "tr", "ka", and "qo" from the "shots" dictionary and update the "list_display_order" accordingly. the number of shots will be reduced from 9 to 6, so we'll update that as well. all other information in the json will remain the same.
